text: Aaron Gabriel Ehasz (born June 16, 1973) is an American television writer and producer. He is known for being the co-executive producer of Avatar: The Last Airbender and the co-creator of the Netflix series The Dragon Prince. In November 2019, Ehasz was accused of sexism while working for Netflix. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Writers from Maryland Category:Businesspeople from Maryland
title: Aaron Ehasz
